meanings.definition: The state of being interconnected or mutually dependent.
meanings.sent1: The interrelatednesses of the ecosystem ensure the survival of all its inhabitants.
meanings.sent2: The interrelatednesses between different departments in the company help maintain efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The interrelatednesses of the puzzle pieces made it challenging to solve.
meanings.sent4: The interrelatednesses of the characters in the story created a complex web of relationships.
meanings.sent5: The interrelatednesses of the food chain illustrate the delicate balance of nature.

meanings.definition: The quality or condition of being interrelated.
meanings.sent1: The interrelatednesses of the data sets provided valuable insights for the research.
meanings.sent2: The interrelatednesses among family members strengthen their bond.
meanings.sent3: The interrelatednesses of the flavors in the dish surprised the chef.
meanings.sent4: The interrelatednesses of the plot twists kept the audience engaged.
meanings.sent5: The interrelatednesses of the colors in the painting created a harmonious composition.
